products.name: Andia European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Andiaguarantees an economical choice within our ABCD Character grade collection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic Natural European White Oak color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Lacquer Finish to create both a natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with light sanding and wire brushing treatments, these floors boast an elegant texture while maintaining their sleek presentation.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish
